channel.title: Singularity The Game *lagg*
channel.description:
Hey people! So my problem is that I have this lagg or I don't know what to call it in Singularity while playing offline (single player)
A video I recorded: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dHjyu-TWUl0[/url]
(you can see it at about 0:13)
You can see my specs in the video description. Please help I tried to google the problem but I found nothing useful...
Thank you!

item.title: Singularity The Game *lagg*
item.dc:creator: extr3me
item.description:
SteXmaN:

extr3me can you explain me how to do this ?

Just be connected to internet. If that doesn’t help turn off or uninstall (at the worst case if u barely know anything about that security stuff) anti-virus software/Firewall. Should help with lag, haven’t tested though… Finished it by the way, excellent game…

Read full topic

I posted this because I don’t have anything useful to say and I wanted to post something because the thread was here I was required by the IBKC to post something.

item.title: Singularity The Game *lagg*
item.dc:creator: extr3me
item.description:
THE ANSWER

Singularity requires that you allow UDP internet connectivity IN/OUT.

That lag every 2 seconds is the game pausing to check for a connection or rather, trying to connect. This connectivity is always required; ie, it is not simply trying to do it once to download files or to register the game. One of the ports (7777) it uses has a history of being used with other titles that utilize the Real engine.

Read full topic

item.title: Singularity The Game *lagg*
item.dc:creator: SteXmaN
item.description:
I have stuttering problem to and i dont have internet connection.Is there a way to fix this i realy want to play this game.

ps i give it access in firewall and nothing changes

Read full topic

item.title: Singularity The Game *lagg*
item.dc:creator: extr3me
item.description:
HaroldCrenshaw:

I had the same problem in Singularity. After a bunch of frustrating trial and error, I figured out it was because I had blocked Singularity with my fire wall.

A process scanner showed that Singularity’s exe keeps pausing to access network-connection files thus causing the regular hesitation. I changed my firewall to ‘ask me’ when Singularity tries to connect and then just ignore the ‘allow or block’ message from my firewall.

Some tags that may help other searchers find this fix:
Singularity PC game stutters stuttering freezing freezes pauses lags slowing down, slows down, excessive hard drive activity, keeps using my hard drive

Will this work even if I don’t have internet connection? Which firewall r u using? I have Kaspersky Internet Security 2010.

Read full topic

Madcat1030:

That random poster might have been onto something. Did you overclock anything on your computer yourself (ie: not done in-store or by the manufacturer)?

Nope, no overclock here :S

Read full topic

item.title: Singularity The Game *lagg*
item.dc:creator: Spooboy
item.description:
Maxey:

In order to fix the low audio volume, you have to alt-tab out of the game and turn the game’s volume up on the windows sound mixer.

If you’re suffering from severe texture popping problems, there’s a fix for that, but it actually involves having to edit a couple of files in a hex editor, including the singularity.exe file itself.

Try this at your own risk.

Thanks, I actually already beat it and uninstalled

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Singularity The Game *lagg*
item.dc:creator: Aze
item.description:
I used fraps to record the lagg, it lagged before fraps, it laggs with low graphs too, and as you can see in the video it has no fps lagg, this is something different. It just stops for a few seconds. And as I wrote in the Youtube description, it even does it in the menu!

Read full topic
